abstract: David Wildstein testifies in trial against Bill Baroni and Bridget Anne Kelly for fourth day; identifies more people in New Jersey Gov Chris Christie's inner circle who were aware of plan to close lanes on George Washington Bridge to punish Fort Lee Mayor Mark Sokolich for failing to endorse Christie in re-election campaign.

headline.print_headline: ‘Mr. Wolf’ Tried to Fix Lane-Closing Scandal, Former Christie Ally Says
headline.main: ‘Mr. Wolf’ Sought to Fix Bridge Scandal, Ex-Christie Ally Testifies

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: David Wildstein, the mastermind behind the New Jersey lane closings, said Gov. Chris Christie invoked the movie “Pulp Fiction” in a joke about the scheme....
lead_paragraph: David Wildstein, the mastermind behind the New Jersey lane closings, said Gov. Chris Christie invoked the movie “Pulp Fiction” in a joke about the scheme.
